casebody.data:
HENRY, Respondent v. HOUSTON, W. ST. & P. FERRY R. CO., Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. January 9, 1894.) Appeal from city court. Action by Thomas E. Henry against the Houston, West Street & Pavonia Perry Railroad Company.

Argued before BOOKSTAVER, BISCHOFF, and PRYOR, JJ.

Coudert Bros., for appellant. J. V. Humphreys, for respondent.

No opinion. Judgment reversed, new trial ordered, costs to the appellant to abide the event See 25 N. Y. Supp. 1144.
